greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of isomorphism classes of anti-associative closed binary operations on a set of order n, listed by class size.
comment: Elements per row: 1,2,4,8,16,30,... (given by A027423, number of positive divisors of n!)
A079179(x) is equal to the sum of the products of each element in row x of this sequence and the corresponding element of A079210.
The sum of each row x of this sequence is given by A079180(x).
link: C. van den Bosch, Closed binary operations on small sets
Index entries for sequences related to groupoids
results.author: Christian van den Bosch (cjb(AT)cjb.ie), Jan 03 2003
